text: Does anyone have any advice for allocating more ram to R? I want to let my desktop computer run an R program for a few hours. However, when I look at task manager, R is barely taking up any resources.  Suggestions?
You might want to increase it to like 40-80k it goes by MB
Thanks for the suggestions guys - I am pretty sure memory.limit() is already maxed out though. setting  memory.limit() to be 7888 (default for me) or 160k yields that same result.

I think the issue is that R can only use a single core of my machine. So it is completely using the processing power of that core. To push to multiple cores requires setting up packages and commands that can use them. But its not worth it in my case. Thanks anyway!
yeah just saw an article on that...looks like a lot of effort
